dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Wait! These glasses are from Lilia!

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: Why would she leave her glasses here?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: She wouldn't forget her glasses like that.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Something has definitely happened, and I have a bad feeling.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: And what bad could have happened? This place is safe, isn't it?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: I have no idea. The only person who was causing her problems lately was Lucas, her jealous ex-boyfriend who was always trying to control my sister's life and company.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: But since I said a few things to him and threatened him a few days ago, he hasn't come back.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: Do you think he was here?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: I hope not for his own good.
